options.name: Monk's Discipline
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes and +1 Concentration.

options.name: Free Action : Palm Strike
options.description: After hitting a Creature with a Melee Attack, make an Unarmed Strike against the same Creature that deals no Damage against a contested Concentration Check. On a failure, the Target becomes Dazed until the end of their next Turn. On a True Hit, the Creature becomes Stunned.

options.name: Action : Flying Kick
options.description: You make a leaping Unarmed Strike moving up to 3 Units towards a Creature using your Acrobatics Modifier as the Attack Check. If the Attack hits, it deals Physical Damage equal to the result of your Check.

options.name: Trained Form
options.description: Become Good at either Acrobatics, Athletics or Concentration

options.name: Unrestricted Movement
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation and +1 Elemental Mitigation while wearing Light or no Armor.

options.name: Trained Form
options.description: Gain +1 Unarmed Attack and +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons

options.name: Reaction [Daily] : Resilient Soul
options.description: In response to being the Target of an Attack, halve the Damage before applying mitigation. If the resulting Damage brings you to 0 Health, gain 1 Health instead. Additionally, you Gain Temorary Health equal to twice your Level that lasts for 1 minute.
